name: Angry Strike
text: Target a hero adjacent to you. +1 ::attack:: Attack for every card in your discard.

name: Angry Swipe
text: Target a hero adjacent to you. +1 ::attack:: Attack for every card in your discard.

name: Chilling Howl
text:
You may discard one of your resolved cards.
**This round:** Enemy heroes in radius cannot fast travel, or move more than 2 spaces with a movement action.

name: Battle Fury
text: Each time after one of your resolved cards is discarded, you may perform its primary action.

name: Menace
text: Move an enemy unit in range 1 space to a space farther away from you.

name: Trace
text:
**Choose one —**
-  Before the attack: If you have one or more cards in the discard, you may move 1 space. Target a hero adjacent to you.
- Target a hero adjacent to you.

name: Hold Ground
text: If there at least two enemy heroes in radius, you may retrieve a discarded card.

name: Threaten
text:
Move an enemy unit in range 1 space to a space farther away from you.
May repeat once.

name: Chase
text:
**Choose one —**
-  Before the attack: If you have one or more cards in the discard, move up to 2 spaces. Target a hero adjacent to you.
- Target a hero adjacent to you.

name: Make a Stand
text: If there are at least two enemy heroes in radius, you may retrieve a discarded card.

name: Form Up!
text:
Move a friendly unit in range 1 space to a space closer to you.
May repeat once.

name: Blunt Force
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: You may move 1 space to a space adjacent to an enemy hero; if you do, push that hero 3 spaces, ignoring obstacles.

name: Light Pilum
text: An enemy hero in range discards a card, if able. You may move 1 space.

name: Terrify
text:
Move an enemy unit in range 1 space to a space farther away from you.
May repeat up to two times.

name: Hunt Down
text:
**Choose one —**
-  Before the attack: If you have one or more cards in the discard, move up to 3 spaces. Target a hero adjacent to you.
- Target a hero adjacent to you.

name: Battle Ready
text: If there are at least two enemy heroes in radius, you may retrieve up to two discarded cards.

name: Testudo!
text:
Move a friendly unit in range 1 space to a space closer to you.
May repeat up to two times.

name: Send Flying
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: you may move up to 2 spaces to a space adjacent to an enemy hero; if you do, push that hero 3 spaces, ignoring obstacles.

name: Heavy Pilum
text: An enemy hero in range discards a card, or is defeated. You may move up to 2 spaces.
